N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 582.4 - Motor vehicle operation

State Regulations

Vehicles shall at all times be operated so as not to
endanger life or property. No person shall drive a vehicle on college streets, roads or highways at a speed greater than is reasonable and prudent under the
conditions and having regard to the actual and potential hazards then existing, but in no event shall a person drive a vehicle in excess of 20 miles per hour. Except for vehicles being operated for authorized official purposes, no person
shall drive a motor vehicle on campus walkways. Notes
